text: Entrapment is a 1999 American crime thriller movie, starring Sean Connery and Catherine Zeta-Jones. It is directed by Jon Amiel. Zeta-Jones plays a character who works for an insurance company. She is sent to help capture an art thief. The art thief is played by Sean Connery. But she herself is also a thief. Soon, the two of them worked together to pull off the biggest theft of the millennium. == Other websites == * * * * Category:1999 crime movies Category:1999 thriller movies Category:1990s crime thriller movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies set in Malaysia Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies set in Scotland Category:Movies directed by Jon Amiel
title: Entrapment (movie)
